pytorch_privacy.utils.torch_tensor_buffer module¶

class pytorch_privacy.utils.torch_tensor_buffer.TensorBuffer(capacity, shape, dtype=torch.float32)[source]¶

Bases: object

Lightweight class to hold series fo tensors of a given shape in a size adaptive tensor. Utilised via the append method.

append(value)[source]¶

Appends a new tensor to the end of the buffer.

Parameters

value – The new tensor to append
